document_data.name: Ibin Stormrider
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ibin Stormrider''' was a person in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

When the king of the [[goblin]] realm of the [[Kingdom of Nix]] was slain, Ibin Stormrider was the most dangerous of the opportunists who gathered around the dead king's throne. In order that a goblin might claim the throne, the leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]] returned to Nix to drive away Ibin and the rest in [[bloodforge]] battle.
